definitions.definition: To lay straw around plants to protect them from frost .
To sell straws on the streets in order to cover the giving to the purchaser of things usually banned , such as pornography .

main_definition: To lay straw around plants to protect them from frost .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete , slang ) To sell straws on the streets in order to cover the giving to the purchaser of things usually banned , such as pornography .
